text: Herbert Marcuse was a German American philosopher who supported Western Marxism. Marcuse worked for the CIA in the 1940s and 50s. Marcuse was a part of the Frankfurt School and supported Critical theory. In the 1960s and 70s, his ideas were popular with the New Left. Category:Marxists Category:1898 births Category:1979 deaths Category:American philosophers
title: Herbert Marcuse
